sentence: i need a flight from saint petersburg to charlotte which will get me into charlotte by five p m or as soon thereafter as possible
sq2:
SELECT DISTINCT  '"'||v0.flight_id||'"', '"'||v1.airport_code||'"',
 '"'||v2.city_code||'"', '"'||v2.city_name||'"', '"'||v3.airport_code||'"',
 '"'||v4.city_code||'"', '"'||v4.city_name||'"',
 v0.arrival_time FROM flight v0, airport_service v1,
 city v2, airport_service v3, city v4 
WHERE (((v0.from_airport = ANY v1.airport_code) 
AND ((v1.city_code = ANY v2.city_code) 
AND (v2.city_name = 'ST. PETERSBURG'))) AND (((v0.to_airport = ANY v3.airport_code) 
AND ((v3.city_code = ANY v4.city_code) 
AND (v4.city_name = 'CHARLOTTE'))) AND ((v0.arrival_time <=  1700) OR (v0.arrival_time = (
SELECT MIN (arrival_time) FROM flight v5 
WHERE ((v5.from_airport IN (
SELECT v6.airport_code FROM airport_service v6 
WHERE (v6.city_code IN (
SELECT v7.city_code FROM city v7 
WHERE (v7.city_name = 'ST. PETERSBURG'))))) 
AND ((v5.to_airport IN (
SELECT v8.airport_code FROM airport_service v8 
WHERE (v8.city_code IN (
SELECT v9.city_code FROM city v9 
WHERE (v9.city_name = 'CHARLOTTE'))))) 
AND (v5.arrival_time >  1700))))))));
sql: ( SELECT DISTINCT FLIGHT.FLIGHT_ID FROM FLIGHT WHERE ( FLIGHT . FROM_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' ST. PETERSBURG ' ) ) AND ( FLIGHT . TO_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' CHARLOTTE ' ) ) AND ( FLIGHT.ARRIVAL_TIME < = 1700 OR FLIGHT.ARRIVAL_TIME = ( SELECT MIN ( ARRIVAL_TIME ) FROM FLIGHT WHERE ( FLIGHT . FROM_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' ST. PETERSBURG ' ) ) AND ( FLIGHT . TO_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' CHARLOTTE ' ) ) AND FLIGHT.ARRIVAL_TIME > 1700 ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ;
